member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices assembly has AggregationCategorizationService class that has public methods required to call Intuit Aggregation and Categorization Service APIs such as GetInsititions, DiscoverAndAddAccounts, and so forth. The IAggregationCategorizationService provides an interface for invoking the Aggregation and Categorization service APIs.

member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService
member.summary: Interface for Aggregation and Categorization Service.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.GetInstitutions
member.summary: Gets a list of institutions supported for data acquisition.
member.returns: Returns a list of institutions.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.GetInstitutionDetails(System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets detailed information for the supplied institution ID.
member.returns: Returns institution details.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.GetCustomerAccounts
member.summary: Gets a list of all accounts belonging to the authenticated user making the call.
member.returns: Returns accounts list.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.GetLoginAccounts(System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets a list of all accounts belonging to the login specified in the URI path.
member.returns: Returns account list.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.GetAccount(System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets all information about the account. If the last refresh date of the account is older than the “refresh-cache-seconds-to-live”, a non-interactive refresh of that account is attempted before it is returned. If that refresh fails the account will still be returned, but the aggrSuccessDate field of the account data will not be updated and a numeric error code indicating the reason for the failure will be found in the aggrStatusCode field.
member.returns: Returns account list.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.GetAccountTransactions(System.Int64,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves all transactions for an account over the specified date range.
member.returns: Returns transaction list.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.GetAccountTransactions(System.Int64,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves all transactions for an account over the specified date range. If the end date of the range is later than the last successful refresh date of the account, a refresh will be attempted before transactions are retrieved. If the refresh fails, the TransactionList is still returned but will have details of the failure in the notRefreshedReason attribute of the TransactionList entity.
member.returns: Returns transaction list.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.UpdateAccountType(System.Int64,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.Account)
member.summary: Updates the type of an account from "Other" to some concrete account type.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.DeleteAccount(System.Int64)
member.summary: Deletes a user's account. Successful deletions returns a 200 status code with no body while a failed deletion will return the appropriate http status code and gives the error code/message in the body.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.DeleteCustomer
member.summary: Deletes the currently authenticated customer.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.UpdateInstitutionLogin(System.Int64,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.InstitutionLogin,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.Challenges@)
member.summary: Update the account type of an added account. As a result of this call, the user may receive a 201 indicating that accounts have been updated, or a 401 meaning the user must provide additional authentication data in order to complete the discovery. In the latter case, a Challenges entity will be present in the response body indicating the information the user must provide to continue. The user supplies this information in the form of a ChallengeResponses entity that is posted to this same URL ommitting the Credentials from the secondary request.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.UpdateInstitutionLogin(System.Int64,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.InstitutionLogin,System.Boolean,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.Challenges@)
member.summary: Update the account type of an added account. As a result of this call, the user may receive a 201 indicating that accounts have been updated, or a 401 meaning the user must provide additional authentication data in order to complete the discovery. In the latter case, a Challenges entity will be present in the response body indicating the information the user must provide to continue. The user supplies this information in the form of a ChallengeResponses entity that is posted to this same URL ommitting the Credentials from the secondary request.
member.param: The institution login. This value can be null when dealing with non restricted FIs
Indicator that an explicit refresh is requested
member.returns: True is successfully updated account type of the added account.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.IAggregationCategorizationService.DiscoverAndAddAccounts(System.Int64,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.InstitutionLogin,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.Challenges@)
member.summary: This API will discover a user’s accounts at an external FI and add them to the CustomerCentral system. As a result of this call, the user may receive a 201 indicating that accounts have been discovered, or a 401 meaning the user must provide additional authentication data in order to complete the discovery. In the latter case, a Challenges entity will be present in the response body indicating the information the user must provide to continue. The user supplies this information in the form of a ChallengeResponses entity that is posted to this same URL ommitting the Credentials from the secondary request.
member.param: Challenges if the request requires MFA.
member.returns: Account List if it is non mfa request.

The user supplies this information in the form of a ChallengeResponses entity that is posted to this same URL ommitting the Credentials from the secondary request.
member.returns: Account List if it is non mfa request.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.AggregationCategorizationService.UpdateInstitutionLogin(System.Int64,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.InstitutionLogin,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.Challenges@)
member.summary: Update the account type of an added account. As a result of this call, the user may receive a 201 indicating that accounts have been updated, or a 401 meaning the user must provide additional authentication data in order to complete the discovery. In the latter case, a Challenges entity will be present in the response body indicating the information the user must provide to continue. The user supplies this information in the form of a ChallengeResponses entity that is posted to this same URL ommitting the Credentials from the secondary request.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.AggregationCategorizationServices.AggregationCategorizationService.UpdateInstitutionLogin(System.Int64,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.InstitutionLogin,System.Boolean,Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Data.Challenges@)

The user supplies this information in the form of a ChallengeResponses entity that is posted to this same URL ommitting the Credentials from the secondary request.
member.param: The institution login. This value can be null when dealing with non restricted FIs
Indicator that an explicit refresh is requested
member.returns: True is successfully updated account type of the added account.

The user supplies this information in the form of a ChallengeResponses entity that is posted to this same URL ommitting the Credentials from the secondary request.
member.param: Challenges if the request requires MFA.
member.returns: Account List if it is non mfa request.
